mapper.select: SELECT WITHDRAWAL_NO, ACCOUNT_NO, NICKNAME, AMOUNT, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, WITHDRAWAL_NO, ACCOUNT_NO, NICKNAME, AMOUNT, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM( SELECT WITHDRAWAL_NO, ACCOUNT_NO, NICKNAME, AMOUNT, WITHDRAWAL_STATUS, CREATED_AT, UPDATED_AT FROM WITHDRAWAL ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM < #{endRow}) WHERE RNUM>=#{startRow}
mapper.update: UPDATE WITHDRAWAL SET WITHDRAWAL_STATUS=#{status} WHERE WITHDRAWAL_NO=#{with_no}
